Events

We love trade shows. We put a lot of work and love in to decorating our booth. Each year we show our latest games at Poznan Game Arena and Pyrkon. We have been also at Digital Dragons and twice at Pixel Heaven.

Reports

  • Poznan Game Arena 2018
  • Poznan Game Arena 2015

2013

Pixel Heaven

June 2013 @ Warsaw, Poland

Not yet as a P1X. First trade show. First Pixel Heaven. In the real basement with spiders and moisure. Lot of fun. This event started all of this.
